name: Tomahawk Inbound
description:
Control a tomahawk missile and avoid hitting walls. Inspired by Saint's Row the Third UAV weapon system. 

Controls 

W: Pitch up

A: Pitch left

S: Pitch down

D: Pitch right

Credits

Crooked Head's Turn Based Strategy Framework: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/50282 (not much used here)
